title: Unable to download the new patch
body:
Whenever I try to download the new patch it always ends up with my client doing this. I have done everything that I can think of to fix this problem and I have gotten nowhere. I haven't been able to get past 1%. Send help



https://gyazo.com/08dbc0c05f3059a4d1fb655c64790659

replies.body:
Im currently experiencing a problem where I get to 75% before I get the unspecified error. ;-;
https://gyazo.com/f71c508f967c9223795d6d7a947f4526

When you're trying to download a new patch, your OS needs to allow the patcher to connect to our servers. If it's getting stuck at 1%, chances are your OS is blocking that connection. Check out our [Permission Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and you should be able to get patching again!

Hit me back up if you have any questions.
